description: An experiment conducted by the University of New South Wales shows that the intake of alcohol has a detrimental effect on the driving performance of both the ordinary motorist and the skilled racing driver. Shows both drivers tackling a course before drinking, and then at blood-alcohol levels of .05 and .08.
